title: SQL Basics: SELECT, WHERE, and ORDER BY
description: Learn fundamental SQL queries including SELECT statements, WHERE clauses for filtering, and ORDER BY for sorting.

title: Joins: INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL OUTER
description: Master different types of joins to combine data from multiple tables and understand join relationships.

title: Aggregation Functions: COUNT, SUM, AVG, GROUP BY
description: Learn aggregate functions, GROUP BY clause, HAVING clause for filtering grouped data.

title: Subqueries and Nested Queries
description: Write subqueries in SELECT, FROM, WHERE clauses, correlated subqueries, and EXISTS clause.

title: Schema Design and Normalization
description: Understand database normalization (1NF to 3NF), primary keys, foreign keys, and relationships.

title: Indexes and Query Optimization
description: Learn about indexes, query execution plans, and optimization techniques for better performance.

title: Transactions: ACID Properties
description: Understand ACID transactions, BEGIN, COMMIT, ROLLBACK, and isolation levels.

title: Window Functions: OVER, PARTITION BY, ROW_NUMBER
description: Learn window functions for analytical queries, ranking, and running calculations.

title: Stored Procedures and Triggers
description: Write stored procedures, functions, triggers for database logic, and cursor handling.

title: CTEs (Common Table Expressions) and Recursive Queries
description: Use WITH clause for CTEs, write recursive CTEs for hierarchical data and complex queries.
